verses.roman:
tapta-hema-sama-kānti, prakāṇḍa śarīra
nava-megha jini kaṇṭha-dhvani ye gambhīra

synonyms: tapta-hema—as molten gold; sama-kānti—same luster; prakāṇḍa—enormous; śarīra—body; nava-megha—new clouds; jini—conquering; kaṇṭha-dhvani—the sound of the voice; ye—that; gambhīra—deep.
translation: The luster of His expansive body resembles molten gold. The deep sound of His voice conquers the thundering of newly assembled clouds.
